entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 20 near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
